title: Change selected background to light blue

requirements.text: Update the background color of the element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[2] to light blue using Tailwind CSS utility classes
acceptanceCriteria: The selected element displays a light blue background color
The color change is applied using Tailwind CSS classes consistent with the existing design system

constraints: Apply the background color change only to the specific element selected by the user via XPath
Use Tailwind CSS utility classes for styling consistency
Do not modify other page elements or the overall color scheme
nonGoals: Modifying the global color system or theme variables
Adding new color tokens to the design system
